abstract.para: Sympedia GenFw is a flexible and easy to use framework for software artifact generation. Input models can be associated with generators via extensible rule sets. Additional Content providers, generators and rules can be provided by Eclipse plugins.
This article explains the GenFw installation procedure.

sect1.title: Prerequisites
sect1.para: Be sure that you have the following software properly installed:

GEF
3.2 200601260200 (only needed if you plan to use the Density Container Debugger)
The concrete versions are the ones I used when writing this.

sect1.title: Eclipse Update Manager
sect1.para: It is rather convenient to use the Eclipse Update Manager to install all the needed features and plugins. For this purpose Sympedia GenFw is available through an Eclipse Update Site.
Proceed with the Sympedia GenFw Tutorial 1.

sect1.title: Download Releases
sect1.para: Proceed with the Sympedia GenFw Tutorial 1.

sect1.title: Checkout the Sources
sect1.para:
GenFw is available through its CVS respository at
http://developer.berlios.de/cvs/?group_id=5851
Checkout the following modules from the util component:
sect1.programlisting: com.sympedia.util com.sympedia.util.eclipse com.sympedia.util.eclipse.resources com.sympedia.util.eclipse.ui com.sympedia.util.emf com.sympedia.util.emf.edit com.sympedia.util.emf.editor com.sympedia.util-feature org.apache.log4j org.beanshell
sect1.para: Checkout the following modules from the genfw component:
sect1.programlisting: com.sympedia.genfw com.sympedia.genfw.ant com.sympedia.genfw.bsh com.sympedia.genfw.bsh.edit com.sympedia.genfw.edit com.sympedia.genfw.editor com.sympedia.genfw-feature com.sympedia.genfw.jdt com.sympedia.genfw.jdt.edit com.sympedia.genfw.jet com.sympedia.genfw.jet.edit com.sympedia.genfw.jmerge com.sympedia.genfw.jmerge.edit com.sympedia.genfw.ui
sect1.para: To deploy GenFw into your Eclipse installation use the menu File | Export... | Deployable Features and select
If everything could be exported to the proper location without errors, you may now close the projects you checked out and restart Eclipse to load the installation.
Proceed with the Sympedia GenFw Tutorial 1.
